name: GitLab
description: GitLab integration for managing projects, issues, and pipelines.
full_description: Powerful integration for GitLab users. This server allows your agent to interact with GitLab repositories, manage issues, handle merge requests, and monitor CI/CD pipelines directly from the chat.

tools.name: gitlab_list_projects
tools.description: List projects in the GitLab instance.

tools.name: gitlab_get_issue
tools.description: Get details of a specific issue.
